definitions.definition: Taking place after one's own death.
examples: Artists obscure during their life often receive posthumous recognition, too late for them to enjoy.

definitions.definition: In reference to a work , published after the author 's death.
examples: His memoirs were his posthumous revenge on enemies he dared not take on alive.

definitions.definition: In reference to a musical opus , published or initially performed after the composer 's death.
Born after the death of one's father.
examples: Posthumous orphans never even knew their fathers.

secondary_definitions: Taking place after one's own death.
In reference to a work , published after the author 's death.
In reference to a musical opus , published or initially performed after the composer 's death.
( originally ) Born after the death of one's father.
